General.Name: Suzhou Harmontronics Auto Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Harmontronics Automation Technology Co., Ltd engages in the research, design, development, sale, and servicing of intelligent manufacturing equipment and systems in China. It offers automotive intelligent manufacturing equipment, including automotive solutions for electric drive and thermal management systems, as well as sensor, wire harness, connector, and controller automation solutions; and battery charging and swapping intelligent manufacturing equipment comprising passenger car charging and swapping stations, commercial vehicle charging and swapping stations, core components, charging pile, and terminal operating systems. The company also provides cloud platform, station control and operation system, as well as multi-configuration, multi-scenario, compatible, sharable, and iterable charging and replacement solutions and services Suzhou Harmontronics Automation Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 2007 and is based in Suzhou, China.
